name: Soley
description:
Soley is a hand drawn interactive experience.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to walk around. Press Space to interact. 

A game by Aevi.

_____________________________________________________________

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
